articles.title: Covid-19: Singapore to impose stricter border controls for travellers from Victoria state in Australia - TODAYonline
articles.description: SINGAPORE — With the increase in the number of Covid-19 cases in the Australian state of Victoria, the Ministry of Health (MOH) on Thursday (May 27) said that Singapore will tighten its border controls for travellers from there.
